com.continuuity.weave.api
Interface ServiceController

All Known Subinterfaces:
WeaveController
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractServiceController
public interface ServiceController

This interface is for controlling a running application.

Nested Class Summary
static interface ServiceController.Listener
          Listener for listening to service state changes.
static class ServiceController.State
          Represents the service state.

getRunId

sendCommand

com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<Command> sendCommand(Command command)
Sends a user command to the running application.

Parameters:
command - The command to send.
Returns:
A ListenableFuture that will be completed when the command is successfully processed by the target application.

                                                                        Command command)
Sends a user command to the given runnable of the running application.

Parameters:
runnableName - Name of the WeaveRunnable.
command - The command to send.
Returns:
A ListenableFuture that will be completed when the command is successfully processed by the target runnable.
